channel.title: Website on Consulting Statistician
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Consulting Statistician

item.title: Build Your Own Website or Blog Using R, RStudio and R Packages.
item.description: Introduction R enthusiasts are focused on developing packages and websites to promote their profile and share their knowledge to the world. Recently released packages such as blogdown, Rmarkdown, bookdown has played a significant amount of role in this popularity for R statistical software among generals users and academics in every field of statistics. Due to this reason, I also wanted to develop my own R package to solve problem in hand and share it with the rstats community.
